column5: there was a serious accident on National Road 5 km 205-206
column9: a motorbike hit another motorbike and overturned into a vehicle coming in the opposite direction. One person was killed
column10: four badly injured and seven others slightly hurt
column11: including a 54 year old Thai man
column12: Vechakam/Karin travelling from Kampong Chhnang to Poipet. ------POSTNEWS
